Ingredients.2: 2 tablespoons brandy-based orange liqueur (such as Grand Marnier®)

Ingredients.10: 1 salt and ground black pepper to taste

Directions.1: Place currants in a small bowl; cover with orange liqueur. Let soak until plump, about 1 hour.

Directions.2: Melt 1/4 cup butter in a large skillet over medium heat. Cook and stir onion and garlic in the hot butter until softened, about 1 minute. Add chicken livers; cook and stir until no longer pink in the center, 5 to 8 minutes.

Directions.3: Place remaining 3/4 cup butter, chicken liver mixture, heavy cream, thyme, and allspice in a food processor; blend until smooth. Transfer to a bowl and stir in currants and orange liqueur. Season pate with salt and pepper.

Directions.4: Divide pate among small ramekins. Refrigerate until firm, at least 3 hours.
